channel.title: ABSCBNShutdown on Roy Tang
channel.description: Recent content in ABSCBNShutdown on Roy Tang

item.title: Repost from gideonlasco https://twitter.com/gideonlasco/statuses/1231830406854373377/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Repost from gideonlasco https://twitter.com/gideonlasco/statuses/1231830406854373377/:

When I see the Senate hearings on the #ABSCBNShutdown, I see so much time, energy, and resources being wasted because of the president’s petty vindictiveness.

We deserve a leader that’s concerned about how we can lift our nation up - not about how he can pull his enemies down.
